amendment.description: To provide housing relief for individuals affected by Hurricane Katrina.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2669 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2669 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S13134-13135; text as modified: CR S13134-13135) To provide housing relief for individuals affected by Hurricane Katrina.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2669 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2669 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
